review: love it....i have seen  many  times....emotions and songs and plot ( though borrowed )  are amazingly  picturized...its very emotional film  close to so many real things in real life ....the most  loved part is to come bak on track of ur life bak at the time in an utmost challeging point and wins the battle despite of all the fears and tears and gain back the success and pleasue and   the lost respect ( the major thing ,i m most inspired )...it is so close to reallity and any one can easily  learn reall lessons  of life ...xxxx but ,i cant understand why this film is low rated by huge ppl and investors  ,i cant understand this..it is pathetc and bad ..ummm .for me , this is simply the ever best movie of my life ...xxx jimy ( london 38 ys old )

this movie has always been close to my heart & shall remain to be so for the whole of my life. whenever i watch it , tears start rolling down my eyes uncontrollably....
 actually, i have been through a rough patch in my life , that  strikingly resembles this movie. when we all had watched it for the first time, we all were taken aback ! 
 i congratulate the whole team of the makers of this movie .
   the message is --  "one should never give up , because when the going gets tough, the tough get going !
 simply love this movie to the core of my heart .
it's music is "icing on the cake"..
hats off !!!
